H0.text: Victoria Coren, as she then was, married whom in November 2012. Richard Ayoade

H3.text: Victoria Coren, as she then was, married whom in November 2012. Dave Mitchell

A4.text: Victoria Coren married David Mitchell in November 2012, in North London.
